title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 25.5 - Time of publication and circularization
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 25.5 - Time of publication and circularization

State Regulations

The publication of such notice pursuant to this Part shall
be made not less than 5 or more than 30 days before the date of the sale. The
notice, if mailed pursuant to section
25.2
or
25.3
of this Part, shall be mailed
not less than 8 nor more than 30 days before the date of
sale. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2
ยง
25.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
